info.description: Restaurant management system with sessions, menus, and orders
info.title: Restaurant Management API

get.description: List all menu items with optional filtering and pagination
Get all menu items for a specific category
Retrieve a specific menu item by ID

post.description: Create a new order for a session

get.description: Retrieve a specific order by ID

put.description: Update the status of an order

get.description: Retrieve all items in an order

post.description: Add a menu item to an order
Create a new dining session for a table

get.description: Retrieve all sessions for a specific table

post.description: Create multiple tables in a specified range

get.description: Retrieve a specific table by its ID

delete.description: Delete a restaurant table (only if no active sessions)

get.description: Retrieve a specific session by its ID

put.description: Update the status of a session

get.description: Retrieve all order items for a specific session
Retrieve all orders for a specific session

put.description: Change the table assignment for a session

availability_status.description: status of the menu item in stock (e.g., "in_stock", "out_of_stock")

created_at.description: when the menu item was created

quantity.description: quantity of the menu item in the order

completed_at.description: when the session was completed, nil if not completed

table_id.description: which table this session is for
